original_text: The door for the middle chamber was in the right side of the house: and they went up with winding stairs into the middle chamber, and out of the middle into the third.
korean_text: 중층 골방의 문은 성전 오른쪽에 있는데 나사 모양 층계로 말미암아 하층에서 중층에 오르고 중층에서 셋째 층에 오르게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: The door for the middle chamber was
in the right side of the house:
and they went up with winding stairs
and out of the middle into the third.
